00014 // find class should eb smarted and take over objectExists?
00015 vector<int> findClass(MavenCompiler* c, string entity, int& namespaceID, int& objectID) {
00016         // we only want to find the raw type
00017         StringList items = split('.', stripRawType(entity));
00018         vector<int> found;
00019         
00020         if(items.length() == 1) {
00021                 namespaceID = -1;
00022                 for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->length(); ++i) {
00023                         objectID = findObjectID(c, i, entity);
00024                         if(objectID >= 0) {
00025                                 namespaceID = i;
00026                                 found.push_back(objectID);
00027                         }
00028                 }
00029         } else if(items.length() == 2) {
00030                 namespaceID = findNamespaceID(c, items[0]);
00031                 found.push_back(findObjectID(c, namespaceID, items[1]));
00032         }
00033         
00034         if(found.size() > 0) objectID = found[0];
00035         else objectID = -1;
00036         return found;
00037 }
